lead_paragraph: Two missiles were fired at aircraft that were targeting artillery positions in the Syrian Golan Heights, but neither came close, the Israeli military said.

byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner reported from Jerusalem, and Anne Barnard from Beirut, Lebanon.
byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and ANNE BARNARD

headline.print_headline: Israel Denies Syria Shot Down Warplane and Drone
headline.main: Israel Denies Claims That Syria Shot Down Warplane and Drone

snippet: Two missiles were fired at aircraft that were targeting artillery positions in the Syrian Golan Heights, but neither came close, the Israeli military said....
abstract: Israeli military says Syrian forces fired two surface-to-air missiles after Israeli aircraft targeted artillery positions in Syrian Golan Heights, but denies Syrians' claim that they downed Israeli warplane and drone.
